name: .LOCALIZED File Extension
summary: Learn about .LOCALIZED files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: LOCALIZED files are not meant to be opened. While you can open a LOCALIZED file in any text editor, it contains no data and should not be edited. Editing or deleting a LOCALIZED file may cause macOS to show localized directory names incorrectly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
